Originals.name: #1 The Pepe
Originals.tip: Wrap sub neatly and keep ham slices folded.

Originals.name: #2 Big John
Originals.tip: Roast beef must be sliced fresh daily for best taste.

Originals.name: #3 Totally Tuna
Originals.tip: Drain tuna well to avoid soggy bread.

Originals.name: #4 Turkey Tom
Originals.tip: Thin, even turkey slices are key.

Originals.name: #5 Vito
Originals.tip: Vito is all about the classic Italian flavors.

Originals.name: #6 The Veggie
Originals.tip: Great vegetarian option; keep avocado spread fresh.

Favorites.name: #7 Spicy East Coast Italian
Favorites.tip: Jimmy Peppers first so they blend with the meat flavors.

Favorites.name: #8 Billy Club
Favorites.tip: Yellow mustard goes lightly so as not to overpower.

Favorites.name: #9 Italian Night Club
Favorites.tip: Evenly distribute meats for balanced bites.

Favorites.name: #10 Hunter's Club
Favorites.tip: Layer the roast beef carefully so it fits properly.

Favorites.name: #11 Country Club
Favorites.tip: Classic combo, ensure fresh turkey and ham.

Favorites.name: #12 Beach Club
Favorites.tip: Fresh cucumbers for that beachy crunch.

Favorites.name: #13 Jimmy Cubano
Favorites.tip: Think Cuban sandwich style: don't skimp on pickles.

Favorites.name: #14 Bootlegger Club
Favorites.tip: Great alternative if you want two meats but not all the extras.

Favorites.name: #15 Club Tuna
Favorites.tip: Provolone (Double) is key for that classic taste.

Favorites.name: #17 Ultimate Porker
Favorites.tip: Stack ham neatly on top of bacon.

Favorites.name: J.J. Gargantuan
Favorites.tip: Extra large. Balance all those meats carefully!

Favorites.name: J.J.B.L.T.
Favorites.tip: Quick and simple; crisp bacon is essential.

Toasted (Hot Sandwiches).tip: Toasting melts the cheese and blends ranch with bacon flavor.
